reviewText: My five year old grandson enjoys these movies.
it was exactly what I expected
My 3 year old son loves the cartoon. It is very child friendly and cute.
My 7 and 8 year old boys love this DVD and watch the whole set over and over again.
My son(9 years old) loves it !

It's Ninjago, I'd be a idiot if I didn't like it.
The case is kind of cheap as all the discs stack in 1 spot.  They should have used a design that spreads them out a little,  like 2 on each side.  But oh well,  and it doesn't impact the super awesome season 1 & 2 veiwing!
Two seasons on one disc and our grandson seemed to enjoy having his own copies.
My son ADORES this series!  I love that is came two seasons in one pack at a great price.  My son's happy and I don't find the show completely annoying so that's always a plus as a mom :)
My grandson is really enthralled with all the Ninjago videos.

My 6 yr old just loved it!
Thanks!
